none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 30, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
Not to be confused with MENTIRA or "Mentira" or MENTIRA or MENTIRA MENTIRA, Kansas City's MENTIRA take the most recent wave of mutant effect ridden so-called hardcore and....well, they make it hardcore again. Furious and chaotic but absolutely in control, MENTIRA slam through six bursts of noisy fury on this 2016 demo, a reminder of what it's supposed to be like to be scared and still be able to scare. Speaking of scary, these kids gonna be on the west coast in a few weeks, and the sweaty flesh will keep this shell in its (justifiably revered) place. Sonic power realized.  MENTIRA
https://mentirainventomentira.bandcamp.com/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ivMlj-rsiQw https://mentira.bandcamp.com/ https://mentiramentira.bandcamp.com/ https://mentira1.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Mentira - Mentira demo 2016 - Terminal Escape
